content.title: Plans and Pricing | Netflix Help Center
content.metaDescription: Discover the different streaming plans Netflix offers and how much Netflix costs.
content.content:
# Plans and Pricing
    Netflix offers a variety of plans to meet your entertainment needs.
As a Netflix member, you are charged monthly on the date you signed up. A Netflix account is for people who live together in a single household. Learn more about [sharing Netflix](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/123277).
[Sign up for Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/signup/) today and choose from several [payment options](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/116380). You can easily change your plan or cancel at any time.
 Netflix Plans
Features
Basic


- Unlimited ad-free movies, TV shows, and mobile games

- Watch on 1 [supported device](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/14361) at a time

- Watch in 720p (HD)

- [Download](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/54816) on 1 supported device at a time

Standard


- Unlimited ad-free movies, TV shows, and mobile games

- Watch on 2 [supported devices](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/14361) at a time

- Watch in 1080p (Full HD)

- [Download](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/54816)on 2 supported devices at a time

- Option to add 1 [extra member](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/123279) who doesn't live with you

Premium


- Unlimited ad-free movies, TV shows, and mobile games

- Watch on 4 [supported devices](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/14361) at a time

- Watch in 4K (Ultra HD) + HDR

- [Download](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/54816)on 6 supported devices at a time

- Option to add up to 2 [extra members](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/123279) who don't live with you

- [Netflix spatial audio](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/126405)

 
### Pricing (Euro)


- **Basic**: 8.99€ /month

- **Standard**: 13.99€ /month ([extra member slots](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/123279)* can be added for 3.99€ each/month)

- **Premium**: 18.99€ /month ([extra member slots](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/123279)* can be added for 3.99€ each/month)


Note:*Extra members have their own account and password, but their membership is paid for by the person who invited them to share their Netflix account. Your plan determines how many extra member slots you can add.
Depending on where you live, you [may be charged taxes](https://help.netflix.com/en/node/50068) in addition to your subscription price.

If you have Netflix through a package or add-on, prices may vary.
  **Was this article helpful?**YesNo
